document.discussion_title: Closer To God (2014) 720p BRRip AC3 5.1 + BRRip AC3 5.1
document.topic_text: BRRip / BDRip , MOVIES Add comments In this dark, gritty sci-fi thriller, a brilliant scientist achieves a radical breakthrough by cloning the first human being. This ignites a massive public outcry, and he finds himself in the middle of an ethical, legal, and religious firestorm. But an even greater threat looms – a horrific failure from the doctor’s past that can no longer be kept hidden. 720P BRRIP AC3 5.1 VERSION
